content: Bash: cd ~/code/chimaro && bd show chimaro-2wen --json | jq '.[0] | {id, status, assignee}'
Bash: bd list --json | jq -r '.[] | select(.assignee == "ClearIsle" and .status == "in_progress") | "\(.id) \(.title)"'
Bash: for id in 566 565 564 563 562 561 560 558; do am-ack "$id" --agent ClearIsle; done
Bash: cd /home/jw/code/jat && git add cli/jat dashboard/src/lib/components/agents/TaskTable.svelte install.sh scripts/setup-repos.sh scripts/hooks/ scripts/install-hooks.sh && git status --short
preview: Running: cd /home/jw/code/jat && git add cli/jat dashboard/...

content: feat: add pre-commit hook for agent registration + dashboard UI improvements
- Move Status column between ID and Title (combined ID/Status into single column)
- Add active row highlighting (bg-info/10) for in_progress tasks with assignee
- Fix background color consistency across all cells
- Block commits if no agent is registered (prevents "Claude" orphan commits)
- Add `jat hooks [path]` CLI command to install hooks
Bash: bd close jat-940b --reason "Completed by ClearIsle"
preview: Running: bd close jat-940b --reason "Completed by ClearIsle...

content: Bash: am-send "[jat-940b] Completed: Move Status column + pre-commit hooks" \
- TaskTable: Moved Status into ID column, added active row highlighting
- Pre-commit hook: Blocks commits without agent registration (prevents 'Claude' orphan commits)
- Added \`jat hooks\` CLI command for installation
- Integrated hooks into setup-repos.sh (installs to all projects)
ClearIsle is now available for next task." \
